snippet: GARNETT--Donald Irwin, passed away on March 1. He was the inventor of Energy Generation Using Continental Shelf Mass: a technology which generates electricity by recovering the potential energy accumulated by the movement of the Earth's tectonic plates. Patent 8258638, issued September 4, 2012. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GARNETT--Donald Irwin, passed away on March 1. He was the inventor of Energy Generation Using Continental Shelf Mass: a technology which generates electricity by recovering the potential energy accumulated by the movement of the Earth's tectonic plates. Patent 8258638, issued September 4, 2012. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GARNETT, DONALD IRWIN
